sentences.en: Choose a soft, medium or firm mattress to suit their individual needs.
sentences.cn: 针对他们各人不同的需要挑选柔软、软硬适中或者坚硬的床垫。
康斯坦斯不喜欢白床垫.

sentences.en: He crouched down and reached under the mattress.
sentences.cn: 他蹲下，把手伸到床垫下面。

sentences.en: He quickly unfolded the blankets and spread them on the mattress.
sentences.cn: 他迅速展开毯子，铺在床垫上。

sentences.en: If someone pokes fun at your mattress on the floor, or teases you about your empty cabinets, smile and take it in stride.
sentences.cn: 如果有人取笑你放在地板上的床垫，或揶揄你空空的橱柜，请面带微笑从容应对此事。

sentences.en: Is the mattress lumpy and saggy?
sentences.cn: 床垫是否高低不平并且下陷？

sentences.en: Move to a reclining position on the mattress and rest for 15 minutes.
Of course lots of kids read dirty books in their rooms and hide them under the mattress.
sentences.cn: 当然很多孩子在他们的房间里看黄书，而且会把它们藏在床垫子底下。

sentences.en: She kept her money under the mattress.
She laid a spring mattress under the sheet.
sentences.cn: 她在床单下面铺了一个弹簧床垫。

sentences.en: The bunk mattress was hard, the blankets prickly and slightly damp.
sentences.cn: 这个铺位的床垫很硬，毯子也很扎人，而且还有点潮。

sentences.en: The mattress and base are normally bought as a set.
sentences.cn: 通常床垫和床架是成套购买的。

sentences.en: The straw mattress needs to be aired.
The ten young people sleep between two hard, narrow beds and one large mattress on the floor with no privacy at all.
sentences.cn: 十个年轻人就睡在两张窄小的硬板床和地板上的一张大床垫上，没有任何隐私可言。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, as a standard mattress wears, the springs soften and so do not support your spine.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，当一张标准床垫用旧后，弹簧就会变软而无法支撑你的脊椎。

sentences.en: We had given him a large foam mattress to sleep on.
sentences.cn: 我们给了他一张大海绵床垫用来睡觉。

sentences.en: With difficulty he released the mattress from the metal frame, and groped beneath it.
sentences.cn: 他费了很大力气才把床垫从金属架上移开，然后在下面摸索。

trans.tran_cn: 床垫，褥垫，空气垫，[建]沉排
trans.tran_en: the soft part of a bed that you lie on
